title: Here are all the S Pen features and functions on the Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra
content:
The Samsung Galaxy S Ultra lineup officially succeeds the Galaxy Note lineup, meaning that the S Pen is here to stay. In fact, we can even hope to see Samsung’s foldables come with S Pen support and even an integrated S Pen if space allows for it. The Galaxy Note series has its fans who

The post Here are all the S Pen features and functions on the Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra integrates the S Pen, much like a Note. Here's everything you can do with the S Pen on this phone!
